title: Ep. 67. Story and Song - Finale, Part One
description: Our heroes' memories have returned. At the end of everything, will they stand together against the encroaching darkness? Or will their past sins leave them irrevocably driven apart?
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
